official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to permit the certification of certain labor organizations as representatives of Postal Service security guards.

summary.text: Permits the certification of specified labor organizations as representatives of Postal Service security guards.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to permit the certification of certain labor organizations as representatives of Postal Service security guards.
